content.description: Overhanging face into the the left side of tower formation. Engaging moves on good rock and has the bonus of ending quite high on the wall over the roof. Great view of the old trees up there.
content.protection: Bolts, a few permadraws and sport lower off anchors.
content.location: Currently left most on the Old Growth Wall. Look for the large overhanging tower/roof high up on the wall, this line ascends that block.

content.description: A clean well featured face leads into the right side of the roof ending on the slab above. Plenty of holds to choose from, but you'll need to choose wisely using a fair amount of body tension.
content.location: This is the far right route on the Old Growth Wall, just next to Kinetica.

content.description: Climb a steep thin face through a bulge, and then navigate large roof.Â
content.location: This route is in the center of the Old Growth Wall (left of Shadow Catcher).

content.description: This route is longer than it looks and contains a large variety of moves. The name comes from mythical creatures (created by Dee) that live up in old-growth trees. The top anchors of "The Overstory" are to your right at the top and can be easily reached from these anchors.
content.protection: Bolts. Steel carabiners on anchor. Lower off.
content.location: Right most route on Old growth wall

content.description: The small alcove saddled between The Studio and Overstory Wall
